title: Data Analyst Intern
description: Assist with data cleaning, SQL querying, building dashboards in PowerBI, Excel and Python (pandas). Basic stats and visualizations required.

title: Junior Data Scientist
description: Work on supervised ML models, feature engineering, data pipelines. Python, pandas, scikit-learn required. Some experience with SQL and model evaluation.

title: Business Intelligence Analyst
description: Build and maintain dashboards in PowerBI, support stakeholders with metrics, SQL skills required, familiarity with ETL processes a plus.

title: Machine Learning Intern
description: Prototype ML models, experiment with neural nets, basic knowledge of PyTorch/TensorFlow preferred. Strong math fundamentals a plus.

title: Data Engineer (Entry)
description: Work on ETL pipelines, Python scripting, SQL, experience with Airflow or similar orchestration helpful.

title: Product Analyst
description: Analyze product metrics, A/B test analysis, SQL, Excel and dashboarding skills. Collaboration with PMs and data teams.

title: Research Intern - NLP
description: Work on NLP tasks, text pre-processing, transformers. Familiarity with Hugging Face and Python required.

title: Excel-Based Reporting Analyst
description: Maintain sales reports using Excel, pivot tables, VLOOKUP/XLOOKUP. Basic SQL is a bonus.

title: AI Research Assistant
description: Work on computer vision pipelines, dataset curation, and model training. Python, OpenCV and PyTorch experience needed.

title: Marketing Data Analyst
description: Analyze campaign data, Google Analytics, SQL reporting, and visualization for marketing teams.
